product_name: Spark R&D Sabretooth Tesla System Splitboard Crampons
long_description: Grip like a pro on icy ascents with the Spark R&D Sabretooth Tesla System Splitboard crampons. These crampons are specifically designed to integrate with the new Tesla system bindings.
short_description: Grip like a pro on icy ascents with the Spark R&D Sabretooth Tesla System Splitboard crampons. These crampons are specifically designed to integrate with the new Tesla system bindings.
